name: Shrapnel Sigma Containment Unit - ETH Collection

metadata.title: Shrapnel Sigma Container Unit (SCU) Collection
metadata.name: Sigma Container Unit #1
metadata.description: As an SCU holder, you will be among the first to access limited-edition content from partnership collaborations with talented web3 artists and gaming brands. Imagine getting your hands on some of the first exclusive Shrapnel skins to elevate your in-game style and stand out from the crowd. Explore, create, and conquer with the Sigma Containment Unit, the power is yours! This is a redeemable NFT that will allow you to receive a pack of in-game items within Shrapnel.
